projects.title: Zero Hunger Website
projects.description: A comprehensive web platform dedicated to Sustainable Development Goal 2: Zero Hunger. Features an educational content hub with parallax design, dynamic JSON-driven merchandise shop with persistent cart functionality, interactive SVG-based sitemap, responsive image gallery, and integrated feedback system. Built with semantic HTML5, modern CSS3 (Flexbox, Grid, Parallax), and vanilla JavaScript with cookie-based state management. Deployed on Vercel with optimized assets and modular design system.

highlights.stateManagement: Browser cookies for persistent cart data
highlights.architecture: Modular CSS design system with separated Navigation, Footer, and Content styles
highlights.dataHandling: Fetch API for dynamic product loading from JSON
